resources.string: This application will save the logs, compress them, and let you upload them easily.
Warning: No root access. Logs may be incomplete, and kernel logs are not possible.
Error saving logs. Check your SD card.

This is a simple application that takes the system logs via dmesg and logcat, and saves them to the primary external storage under SysLog/<Date-Time>, compresses them, and lets you upload/email them. Root access is required for 4.1+ to access the full logs, and for kernel logs.
